Node.Text: Your stutter is back, are you okay? What's wrong?
O-oh... n-nothing's wr-wrong, d-d-dear... I'm j-just a bit sh-shaken is a-a-all...
P-please, do m-me a favor... s-st-stay s-safe tonight and t-t-tomorrow. S-something's coming.
Node.Hint: Caroline is aware of a coming danger. How involved is she?

Node.Text: I'm s-scared, d-d-dear... t-tomorrow, it's h-happening to-tomorrow...
It wi-will all end to-tomorrow, that's w-when sh-sh-she's coming for me...
Node.Hint: Caroline believes a woman will harm her tomorrow.

Node.Text: O-oh, I've s-said t-too much... d-d-don't w-worry ab-bout it...
I n-n-need to go n-now... see you s-soon...
